entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 21 by morning. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:00 PM CST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 23 in the afternoon. POP 30%
